name: 44 - Criss-Cross Overlay (sprite)
author: UTH9wXZFkTza6igr
command:
let params = [
  {
    filterType: "sprite",
    filterId: "crissCrossBox",
    imagePath: "modules/tokenmagic/fx/assets/box.webp",
    repeat: true,
    alphaDiscard: true,
    colorize: true,
    color: 0x0000FF,
    inverse: true,
    gridPadding: 1,
    maintainAspectRatio: false,
    maintainScale: false,
    scaleX: 0.16,
    scaleY: 0.16,
    translationX: 0,
    translationY: 0,
    rotation: 45,
    alpha: 0.75,
    top: true,
    animated: {
      rotation: {
        active: false,
        clockWise: false,
        loopDuration: 30000,
        animType: "syncRotation"
      }
    },
  }
];

await TokenMagic.addUpdateFiltersOnSelected(params);
